datetime.years: {y,plural,one{# year} few{# years} many{# years} other{# years}}
datetime.months: {m,plural,one{# month} few{# months} many{# months} other{# months}}
datetime.days: {d,plural,one{# day} few{# days} many{# days} other{# days}}
datetime.hours: {h,plural,one{# hour} few{# hours} many{# hours} other{# hours}}
datetime.minutes: {i,plural,one{# minute} few{# minutes} many{# minutes} other{# minutes}}
datetime.seconds: {s,plural,one{# second} few{# seconds} many{# seconds} other{# seconds}}
